description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Built in an underground lab by a team of scientists from steel alloy and raw rage. Raised by a pride of lions until you killed them for food at age six. Trained to withstand face-melting heat, eyeball-freezing cold, and mind-numbing fear. You are Army, the world's preeminent badass. And you must stand alone.  - All proceeds from this game will go to charity.
description.short: Built in an underground lab by a team of scientists from steel alloy and raw rage. Raised by a pride of lions until you killed them for food at age six.
